title: Does any company in the US have 5G technology? - Quora

response.answer_text: 5G technology There are a number of American companies very strong Qualcomm is a leader in 5G for handsetsApple handsets (still secret but credible rumours)Intel (*). Sold handsets group but strng in chips for infrastructureMarvell. Chips for infrastructureIf you mean 5G infrastructure / base stations, however, then tbat is dominated by HuaweiEricssonNokiaSamsungAnd not American firms. On Core network then America is strong: CiscoJuniperthere are some small specialists eg Parallel Wireless in USA There are projects being led by Facebook (TIP) and Googler (eg Project Loon) but they are not yet commercial (*) My previous startup Picochip was acquired by Intel is now part of this team working on 5G chips for infrastructure

Yes QUALCOMMERICSONATTNOKIA obviously not American companies but they are manufacturing 5 g parts & infrastructure in the USA.Our government banned HUAWEI And they have the most developed 5G worldwide (it's a Trump thing WHY)We have ways to scan for embedded spyware so this is our loss we could then use an accepted worldwide standard instead of Type A,B,C etc get the idea
